source:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SEQ_00The look in Kabuto's eyes suggests he recently received good news.
※The difficulty of this quest will be synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限
碧のタマミズのカブトは、新たなお宝探しに出たいようだ。

source:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SEQ_01There is treasure in the Azim Steppe, and Kabuto is able to relay the news to you with surprising clarity. Because the Kojin are unfamiliar with the Steppe, Tsukumo asks that you accompany them on this expedition. No sooner do you consent than they make for Reunion.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SEQ_01※本クエストには
「 レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限」が、
　設定されています。
　受注時と同じクラス・ジョブでのみ進行できます。

カブトから、アジムステップでのお宝探しに同行するよう依頼された。アジムステップの再会の市にいる「カブト」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SEQ_02<tab>When you arrive at Reunion, Kabuto and Tsukumo are eager to begin their search. They suggest splitting up to speak with as many of the settlement's inhabitants as possible.
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SEQ_02<tab>カブトと話した。再会の市で、お宝についての話を聞こう。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SEQ_03<tab>You hear various rumors of a bow which grants its user strength beyond belief, its owner being a young boy of the Qestir tribe named Uchikin. Perhaps Kabuto has additional information to share.
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SEQ_03<tab>お宝の話を聞いた。ウチキンというケスティル族が、太陽を射ると噂されるお宝の弓を持っているようだ。再会の市の「カブト」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SEQ_04<tab>Kabuto tells you of his awkward and otherwise fruitless conversation with the Qestir tribe. Though they had no words of insight to offer, Kabuto believes the Qestir's mannerisms suggested they go and see the bow for themselves. Tsukumo suggests you split up once more to search for the young boy and his bow.
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SEQ_04<tab>カブトと話した。再会の市付近で、「ウチキン」という名のケスティル族を探そう。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SEQ_05<tab>You find a young Qestiri boy who you believe to be Uchikin, but his bow is nowhere to be found. His sullen expression suggests it was stolen. Realizing you have come to help he says nary a word, but points southeast. You head in that direction expecting to find his bow, and likely trouble as well.
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SEQ_05<tab>ウチキンと話した。彼の弓が何者かに奪われたようだ。アジムステップで賊を探して、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DFB01 /var>」を取り戻そう。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SEQ_06<tab>It does not take long for you to find Uchikin's bow, and the two Red Kojin who stole it. A quick thrashing as only you could give sends them running. Uchikin will be quite pleased to have his bow returned to him.
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SEQ_06<tab>紅甲羅を討伐して、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DFB01 /var>を取り戻した。再会の市付近の「ウチキン」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DFB01 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SEQ_07<tab>Uchikin is silent, but his look of relief upon being reunited with his bow speaks volumes. It soon becomes clear that bow has no supernatural powers nor is Uchikin a naturally gifted marksman. In truth, his talent is born from the incredible time and dedication he poured into honing his skills. Kabuto and Tsukumo have no interest in asking for something he considers so precious and are ready to depart when Uchikin's father hands them an envelope. Enclosed within is a document granting the Blue Kojin leave to barter and trade in Reunion. There are, however, still finer details of the agreement that must be discussed. Tsukumo and Kabuto follow Uchikin's father back to Reunion and ask you to meet with them back in Tamamizu.
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SEQ_07<tab>ウチキンに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DFB01 /var>を渡した。この弓は、父親の愛が詰まった品で、ウチキンにとっての宝だった。これを冒険者が取り戻したことで、ケスティル族と縁を結ぶことができた。紅玉海の碧のタマミズにいる「カブト」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SEQ_08<tab>All things considered, talks with the Qestir went smoothly. The future of trade for the Blue Kojin seems bright, but Kabuto is concerned he relies far too heavily on your strength. It seems Kabuto still has much to learn of what it means to lead.
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SEQ_08<tab>カブトと話した。カブトは、またしても冒険者の協力のおかげで縁を結べたことで、己の実力不足を反省しているようだ。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Kabuto in Reunion.
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TODO_00<tab>再会の市のカブトと話す

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the people of Reunion.
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TODO_01<tab>再会の市でお宝の話を聞く

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Kabuto.
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TODO_02<tab>カブトと話す

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TODO_03<tab>Search for Uchikin.
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TODO_03<tab>ウチキンを探す

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TODO_04<tab>Search for Uchikin's stolen bow.
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TODO_04<tab>賊を探し、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DFB01 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TODO_05<tab>Deliver the stolen bow to Uchikin.
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TODO_05<tab>ウチキンに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DFB01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Kabuto in Tamamizu.
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TODO_06<tab>碧のタマミズのカブトと話す

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SYSTEM_000_000<tab>In order to undertake this quest, you must first complete the main scenario quest “Here There Be Xaela.”
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SYSTEM_000_000本クエストを進行するためには、
「メインクエスト：紅蓮のリベレーター」の、
「風駆けるアジムステップ」を完了する必要があります。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_001<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Your timing is fortuitous as always.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_001)) (( )) 02 /var>殿……
此度も助力を頼みたい……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_002<tab>We recently received word of an artifact in the Azim Steppe worthy of the vault. As I am unfamiliar with lands beyond the Ruby Sea, I would ask you accompany me.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_002はるか北西のアジムステップなる場所にて、
まだ見ぬお宝があるとの噂を、仲間が聞きつけたぁ……。
内陸での行動は不慣れゆえ、ぜひ同行願いたい……。

source:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_003Well said, Kabuto. I knew you had it in you.
Your assistance would be greatly appreciated, )) (( )) 02 /var>. Being such a well-traveled adventurer, I suspect you would be much better suited to guide us.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_003うむ、カブトよ、しっかりと頼めたようじゃの。
)) (( )) 02 /var>殿、わしからも同行をお願いしたい。
コウジン族には、現地の様子に詳しい者がおらぬでな。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_004<tab>Excellent! Then we will meet you in Reunion.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_004おお、快諾してくれるか、ありがたい！
それでは、まずは「再会の市」なる場所へと赴き、
情報を集めるとしようぞ！

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_009<tab>There you are. A beautiful place, is it not? Would that the winds were not so strong. I feel as though I could be whisked away at any moment.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_009おお、待っていたぞよ。
このあたりは、風が強く、吹き飛ばされそうでかなわん。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_PERSONA02975_000_009<tab>A hardened warrior, I see. There's no need to deny it─the stench of blood and battle is unmistakable.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_PERSONA02975_000_009む、お主、かなりの手練れとお見受けする……。
いえ、我らも剛の部族ゆえ、同じ匂いがしたもので。
多くの修羅場をくぐりぬけたのでしょうね。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_PERSONB02975_000_009<tab>Hmmm. You've the look of a warrior. Yes, one who might know an able-bodied man or two worthy of the Buduga. Perhaps you could introduce me?
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_PERSONB02975_000_009あんた、見るからに強そうだな。
類は友を呼ぶというから、あんたの知り合いも強かろう……。
よければ、もっとも強い男の知り合いを紹介してくれ。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_PERSONC02975_000_009<tab>Admiring my bow, are you? You will find no better in all the Steppe. A lesser weapon would bring shame to the Oronir.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_PERSONC02975_000_009旅の者よ、どうだ我が弓は？
実にすばらしいだろう？
俺は武を重んじるオロニル族ゆえ、武器にも気を使うのさ。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_010<tab>There are Au Ra everywhere. It calls to mind Sui<var 1F /var>no<var 1F /var>Sato.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_010どこを見ても、アウラ族ばかり……
まるでスイの里のよう……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_011<tab>I was concerned you would only retreat further into your shell being so far away from home, but I am glad to be mistaken. At any rate, we must not waste any more time.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_011うむ、海から遠く離れることで、
弱気になるかと思ったが、杞憂だったようじゃな。
では、手分けして、お宝の噂について調べるぞよ！

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_012<tab>I will accompany Kabuto and see what we can learn here in Reunion. You should have a look about as well and see if you can learn aught of this treasure.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_012わしは、カブトの懐に忍びて、話を聞いて回るゆえ、
終わったら、ふたたびここで落ち合おうぞ！

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_PERSONA02975_000_020<tab>A great treasure? Do you mean the bow belonging to that Qestiri boy? I've heard he can pierce the very heavens with it.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_PERSONA02975_000_020お宝の噂だと……？
最近、とあるケスティル族が、宝と呼ぶに相応しい弓を手に入れ、
太陽すら射るほど腕を上げたと聞いたぞ！

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_PERSONA02975_000_029<tab>I only know that the bow belongs to a boy of the Qestir tribe. Would that I had such a weapon.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_PERSONA02975_000_029最近、とあるケスティル族が、宝と呼ぶに相応しい弓を手に入れ、
太陽すら射るほど腕を上げたと聞いたぞ！

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_PERSONB02975_000_020<tab>Yes, I've heard of the young Qestiri boy and his bow. Uchikin is his name.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_PERSONB02975_000_020おや、また噂好きが現れたか。
お宝の持ち主は、ケスティル族の「ウチキン」だよ。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_PERSONB02975_100_020<tab>Though I love a good rumor, I suggest you speak with him yourself to learn the truth.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_PERSONB02975_100_020現物が見たいなら、本人に頼んでみるといい。
ウチキンなら、市場の外でよく弓の練習をしているよ。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_PERSONB02975_000_029<tab>If you would know the truth of Uchikin and his bow, it would be best to see it for yourself.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_PERSONB02975_000_029お宝の持ち主は、ケスティル族の「ウチキン」だよ。
現物が見たいなら、本人に頼んでみるといい。
ウチキンなら、市場の近くで弓の練習をしているよ。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_PERSONC02975_000_020<tab>A boy with a bow that can pierce the heavens? Hmph. I've heard the rumors, but who would believe such nonsense. I guarantee you his bow pales in comparison to mine.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_PERSONC02975_000_020お宝の噂だって……？
ああ、太陽を射るほど素晴らしい弓があるって話だろ？
あれはデマさ……正体はありふれた弓なんだからな。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_PERSONC02975_000_029<tab>The rumors are just that─rumors. His bow is likely plainer than the horns on my head.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_PERSONC02975_000_029太陽を射るほど素晴らしい弓があるって話だろ？
あれはデマさ……正体はありふれた弓なんだからな。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_029<tab>You missed a rather amusing conversation. I never imagined meeting anyone who speaks less than Kabuto.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_029おお、戻ったか。
市場の主とカブトの会話を見せてやりたかったぞ……。
言葉数の少なさにかけて、カブトを上回る者がいるとはの。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_030<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. How did you fare? I spoke with the Au Ra of the Qestir tribe. Well, I tried to. I was met only with silence.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_030)) (( )) 02 /var>殿、戻られたかぁ……。
ケスティル族とは、実に不可思議な者たち……。
言葉を使わずに、市場を仕切るとはぁ……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_031<tab>A pity you were not there. Kabuto speaking with a man of fewer words than himself is something that must be seen to be believed.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_031言葉数の少なさにかけて、カブトを上回る者がいるとはの。
)) (( )) 02 /var>殿にも、
あの様子を見せたかったものじゃ。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_032<tab>How is it they can govern Reunion yet never speak?
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_032言葉を介さずに市場を仕切るなど、
どうして可能なのかぁ……？

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_Q1_000_000<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_A1_000_001<tab>They gained the trust of their brethren through actions, not words.
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_A1_000_001<tab>日々の行動で信頼を得ているから

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_A1_000_002<tab>They have an august presence that commands respect.
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_A1_000_002<tab>威厳がにじみ出ているから

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_033<tab>Indeed. Words mean nothing without action to prove their worth.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_033確かに、100の言葉を並べたところで、
信頼のおけぬ者ならば、空しく響くのみ……。
行動こそが、信頼を築くということかぁ……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_034<tab>Indeed. I doubt such authority is earned with empty words.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_034確かに、内面からにじみでる威厳は、
100の言葉を並べたとて、出せるものではなし……。
行動こそが、信頼を築くということかぁ……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_035<tab>Though I know not how, their silence spoke volumes. It said that we should judge this treasure with our own eyes.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_035噂のお宝について問うたものの、返事はなし……。
だが、その瞳は「己の目で確かめよ」と、
語っているようだったぁ……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_036<tab>That would certainly be the fastest way to ascertain the truth of the stories that brought us here. Speaking of stories, were you able to learn anything from the residents of Reunion, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_036噂もまた、己の行動で確かめよということか……。
ところで、)) (( )) 02 /var>殿は、
何か情報を得ることができたかの？

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_037<tab>A boy of the Qestir tribe. I see. Persuading him to relinquish a weapon of such value seems unlikely, but at the very least we should seek him out.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_037なるほど、ケスティル族のウチキンなる者が、
素晴らしい弓を手に入れ、太陽を射るほど腕を上げた、と……。
譲ってくれるかはわからぬが、ひと目見てみたいものじゃ。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_038<tab>We are like to find him faster if we split up. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, would you try searching south of Reunion? Kabuto and I will go north.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_038では、市場の外にいるという「ウチキン」とやらを、
二手に分かれて、探してみようぞ！
)) (( )) 02 /var>殿は、市場の南西の方を頼むぞよ！

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_UCHIKIN_000_040<tab>...
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_UCHIKIN_000_040<tab>…………。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SYSTEM_100_040<tab>Uchikin seems awfully dejected.
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SYSTEM_100_040<tab>ウチキンは、ひどく落胆しているようだ。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_UCHIKIN_101_040<tab>...
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_UCHIKIN_101_040<tab>…………。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SYSTEM_000_041<tab>Uchikin stifles his tears as he points southeast. Bereft of his bow, you surmise it was stolen. The culprit likely made off in the direction Uchikin is pointing.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SYSTEM_000_041ウチキンは涙をこらえながら、南東の方角を指さした。
どうやら、彼の大事な弓を何者かが奪い、
彼が指さす方へ逃走したようだ。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_Q2_000_000<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_A2_000_001<tab>Don't worry. I'll retrieve your bow.
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_A2_000_001<tab>取り戻してやる！

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_A2_000_002<tab>Wait here.
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_A2_000_002<tab>ここで待ってろ！

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_UCHIKIN_000_043<tab>...
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_UCHIKIN_000_043<tab>…………。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SYSTEM_000_044<tab>Uchikin seems immensely grateful for your aid. You should leave now before the thief gets away.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SYSTEM_000_044ウチキンは、大変感謝しているようだ。
賊を探して、「」を取り戻そう。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_UCHIKIN_000_048<tab>...
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_UCHIKIN_000_048<tab>…………。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SYSTEM_000_049<tab>Uchikin points to the southeast. You should leave now, lest the thief get away.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SYSTEM_000_049ウチキンは南東の方角を指さした。
彼の弓を奪った賊は、彼が指さす方に逃走したようだ。
賊を探して、「」を取り戻そう。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_POP_MESSAGE_000_050<tab>
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_POP_MESSAGE_000_050<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_BALLOON_000_050<tab>We were followed!?
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_BALLOON_000_050<tab>追っ手かァー！

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_BALLOON_000_051<tab>The treasure is ours!
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_BALLOON_000_051<tab>お宝を渡すものかァー！

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_BALLOON_000_052<tab>You will pay for your meddling!
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_BALLOON_000_052<tab>思い知らせてやるー！

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_059<tab>That bow. Is that what I think it is?
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_059)) (( )) 02 /var>殿、
その弓は、まさかぁ……！？

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_059<tab>We failed to find the bow, but did manage to track down Uchikin's father. I can only hope your search was more fruitful.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_059ウチキン殿の父君を見つけたのだが、
何かもめ事があったようじゃの……？

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_UCHIKINPAPA_000_058<tab>...
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_UCHIKINPAPA_000_058<tab>…………。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SYSTEM_000_059<tab>Uchikin's father seems glad to see you have retrieved his son's bow.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SYSTEM_000_059ウチキンの父は、息子の大切な弓を奪還したことに対して、
心から感謝しているらしい。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_UCHIKIN_000_060<tab>...
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_UCHIKIN_000_060<tab>…………。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_UCHIKIN_000_061<tab>...
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_UCHIKIN_000_061<tab>(-ウチキンと父親-)…………。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_062<tab>They both seem quite pleased to have the bow returned.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_062無事に、弓が戻ってきて、
ふたりとも、大変感謝しているようじゃ。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_063<tab>Where did you find it? We were just preparing to search the area with Uchikin's father.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_063わしらは、ウチキン殿の父君と出会い、
ここに案内されてきたのだが……
いったい誰が、弓を奪ったのだ？

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_064<tab>The Red Kojin!? I didn't expect them to come this far in search of treasure.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_064なんと、紅甲羅どもがぁ……！？
アジムステップにまで、現れるとはぁ……！

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_065<tab>Come now, Kabuto. If we were able to learn of this great treasure, it stands to reason they might come to know of it as well.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_065碧甲羅にも届くような、名高きお宝の噂じゃ……。
紅甲羅が知り、奪いに来たとしても、おかしくはないぞよ。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_066<tab>That said, this bow doesn't appear to be particularly unique, though it does seem easy for a child to wield.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_066しかし、その弓……。
拙者には、逸品名品の類いには見えぬ……。
子どもでも扱いやすそうではあるがぁ……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_UCHIKIN_000_067<tab>...
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_UCHIKIN_000_067<tab>…………。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_068<tab>So that is the way of it. The bow is for Uchikin's training.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_068ほうほう、そういうことかの……。
その弓は、父君がウチキン殿のことを想い、
練習用にと贈った品のようじゃ。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_069<tab>Then it was not the bow but Uchikin's natural prowess that spurred the rumors?
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_069では、ウチキン殿が太陽を射ると噂されるほどに、
短期間で腕を上げたのは、お宝の弓のおかげではなく、
天賦の才によるものだとぉ……？

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_UCHIKINPAPA_000_070<tab>
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_UCHIKINPAPA_000_070<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_100_070<tab>I suspect Uchikin was not all that talented when he began practicing.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_100_070父君の様子から察するに、どうやらウチキン殿の弓の腕は、
もともと才能があったわけではなさそうじゃな……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_071<tab>Take a closer look at the bow. Its size is perfect for him, and the draw weight seems to be such that he can handle it with ease. Moreover, it appears to be far from new, meaning Uchikin has put a great deal of care into maintaining it.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_071カブトよ、ウチキン殿の弓をよく見るのじゃ。
大きさや弦の張り具合は、少年の身体に最適のもの……。
さらに使い込まれ、それでいて手入れが行き届いておる。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_072<tab>I think it was crafted by his father as a gift. And because Uchikin enjoyed the bow so much, he labored tirelessly to master it. It is indeed a treasure─in Uchikin's eyes.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_072父が息子を想い、使いやすい弓を創り、
息子は父の想いを受け、鍛錬に励み、弓を大切に扱った。
ウチキン殿にとって、この弓は紛れもないお宝なのじゃ！

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_UCHIKIN_000_073<tab>
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_UCHIKIN_000_073<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_100_073<tab>Well, there you have it. And who are we to ask him to part with something so precious? No, I believe there is nothing left for us here.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_100_073ほれほれ、ウチキン殿も同意しておる。
それほど大事な弓を、我らが譲り受けるわけにはいかぬな。
お目にかかれただけでよしとして、引き上げるとするかの。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_UCHIKINPAPA_000_074<tab>...
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_UCHIKINPAPA_000_074<tab>…………。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_075<tab>What is this?
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_075<tab>これはぁ……？

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_076<tab>I think he means to grant us leave to barter in Reunion.
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_076<tab>どうやら、再会の市での商売を認める証紙のようじゃ……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_100_076<tab>You would welcome trade with the Blue Kojin?
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_100_076<tab>我らと縁を結んでくれるということかの？

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_UCHIKINPAPA_000_077<tab>
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_UCHIKINPAPA_000_077<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_100_077<tab>Thank you, sir. Thank you! Trade here in the Azim Steppe will prove more valuable than any single treasure.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_100_077なんと、碧甲羅との取引も始めてくれるそうじゃ！
これは、遠路はるばる来たかいがあったな！！

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_078<tab>Again we have gained a new ally thanks to you.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_078ありがたい……。
またひとつ、新たな縁が結ばれるとはぁ……！

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_079<tab>Your resourcefulness never ceases to amaze. Isn't that RiGht...KaBu...
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_079)) (( )) 02 /var>殿に同行を頼んで……
正解……だったよう……じゃ…………。
カ、ブ、ト、も…………。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_080<tab>Tsukumo!?
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_080<tab>ツ、ツクモ！？

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_081<tab>...Hm? Where was I? Ah yes, your resourcefulness. There is much we have to learn from you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_081……む、何の話じゃったかの？
おう、そうそう、よき学びを得たようじゃと言いたかったぞよ。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_082<tab>Why do you all stare at me so? Is something the matter?
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_082……どうした、皆の者？
なにゆえ、そのような驚愕の顔でわしを見つめておるのじゃ？

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_083<tab>You suddenly stopped moving, as if devoid of life.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_083今、動きが止まったように……
大丈夫、なのかぁ……？

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_084<tab>Nonsense. You must be imagining things. I assure you I am perfectly fine.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_084なに、気のせいじゃろ？
心配など無用じゃぞ！

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_100_084<tab>Uchikin's father wants us to follow him. No doubt there are still details of our new trade agreement that must be decided upon.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_100_084お、父君がわしらを市場へ招いておられる。
商いの手続きがあるようじゃな。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_085<tab>Kabuto and I can handle matters from here. Once we have finished our business in Reunion, we will meet you back in Tamamizu.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_085)) (( )) 02 /var>殿、
アジムステップでのお宝探しは、これにて終いじゃ。
わしらは市場に寄るゆえ、先に碧のタマミズに戻られよ。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_089<tab>I told Kabuto there is nothing to worry about but he refuses to listen. Perhaps you can make him listen to reason.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_089カブトめ、心配ないと言っておるのに、大げさすぎるのじゃ。
)) (( )) 02 /var>殿からも、
気にするなと言ってほしいぞよ。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_090<tab>Talks with the Qestir went well. While returning home, however, Tsukumo began acting strangely again.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_090)) (( )) 02 /var>殿、戻られたかぁ……。
市場で取引の手続きを済ませ、お宝も受け取ってきたぁ……。
だが、帰路の道中でもツクモが度々、動きを止めて……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_091<tab>For the last time, Kabuto, I am fine. I was merely tired from the long journey.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_091カブトよ、心配無用だと言ったろう！
経験したことのない長旅で、少々疲れただけじゃ！！

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_092<tab>But enough about me. We should be celebrating a job well done. Trade with Reunion will open up new opportunities for the Blue Kojin, and the Qestir have taught us a lesson on the importance of one's actions. I hope it is one you took to heart, Kabuto.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_092)) (( )) 02 /var>殿の助力もあって、
この旅では、大いに見聞を広めることができたぞよ。
ケスティル族の行動による表現は、大いに学びとなったはず。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_093<tab>I have. It was inspiring to see how they could manage all of Reunion yet never speak.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_093……確かに、口下手な拙者にとって、
言葉に頼らず市場をまとめるケスティル族は驚愕だったぁ……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_094<tab>Yet I still find myself relying on <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> more than I should.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_094だが、此度の旅路では、
)) (( )) 02 /var>殿に頼り切り……。
拙者は、何も貢献しておらぬ……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_095<tab>What happened to the confident Kojin I saw in the Azim Steppe? This is no way for the leader of the Divine Circle to behave. Is that not so, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_095やれやれ、自信を付けたと思ったら、早々落ち込むとは……。
カブトは、碧の宝探衆を率いる頭なのだぞ？
)) (( )) 02 /var>殿も、何か言ってくれぬかの？

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_Q3_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_A3_000_001<tab>The others are counting on you, Kabuto.
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_A3_000_001<tab>いざというときにどうするつもりだ？

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_A3_000_002<tab>I have faith in you, Kabuto.
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_A3_000_002<tab>カブトならできる

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_096<tab>...
target: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_KABUTO_000_096<tab>…………。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_097<tab>My apologies, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, but it seems we will have need of your assistance a while longer.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_TSUKUMO_000_097やれやれ……。
申し訳ないが、)) (( )) 02 /var>殿の助けは、
まだまだ必要そうじゃのう。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SYSTEM_000_200<tab>The Qestir of the Azim Steppe have invited the Blue Kojin to barter in Reunion, and offered a contribution to the treasure vault.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SYSTEM_000_200ケスティル族との縁が結ばれました。
碧の宝探衆が、お宝を奉納したため、
宝物殿に、さらにお宝が増えました！

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SYSTEM_000_201<tab>You have achieved <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Respected<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> reputation with the Kojin.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SYSTEM_000_201「コウジン族：碧甲羅」との友好関係が、
「敬意」になりました。
新たな縁を結んだことで、憧れの存在となったようです。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SYSTEM_000_202<tab>New Kojin beast tribe daily quests are now available from Zukin at Tamamizu.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SYSTEM_000_202これ以降、碧のタマミズにいる「ズキン」より、
新たな「蛮族デイリークエスト」を受注することができます。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SYSTEM_000_203<tab>Furthermore, you will be able to undertake three additional quests from Zukin as a reputation bonus. This bonus is available until the daily reset time for beast tribe quests.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SYSTEM_000_203なお、友好ランクが上がった当日に限り、
「ズキン」から受注できるデイリークエストの数が、
ボーナスとして、3つ追加されています。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SYSTEM_000_204<tab>These additional quests will become available after accepting all current daily quests from Zukin. Please be advised that you cannot undertake these quests if you have no remaining allowances.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SYSTEM_000_204友好ランクが上がる前に発行されたデイリークエストを、
すべて受注するとボーナス分が発行され、
受注権のある限り、これを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SYSTEM_000_205<tab>You now have access to a wider selection of wares from Shikitahe.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN003_02975_SYSTEM_000_205また、「シキタヘ」より、
「友好関係：敬意」の商品を購入できるようになりました。
今後の冒険に役立てましょう！
